title: Bright 1st Floor,Spacious Kitchen,Sh Laundry,Pkg Av(3070 San Bruno #5)
posting_body: * Parking available for an add'l fee
First floor 1BR/1BA in Visitacion Valley near San Bruno and Olmstead.
Floors are faux hardwood except in kitchen and bath.
Heat is via wall gas heater.
Living room is large and has a bank of three windows overlooking the neighborhood and the building's open part of the garage.
Galley kitchen is adjacent to the living room.
It includes granite counters and an electric stove.
There is a small dining space in front of a window which is on the same wall as the living room.
Bedroom has two closets, one walk-in, the other large.
There is also a wall closet with sliding doors next to the entrance to the apartment.
Assigned parking space available at an additional fee.
Building has shared washer and dryer and an elevator.
Building is at the start of a shopping and dining district on San Bruno Avenue.
Very close to (K)T-line, bus lines 6, 8X/AX, 9, 16, 56 and 91.
CalTrain station is less than 10 blocks distant.
Bayview Park is less than two blocks away.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.
Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
